articles.title: Star Awards Top 10 Popular Artistes nominees revealed, Brandon Wong bags his first nom - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: TV veteran Wong earns his first-ever popularity award nomination in a career that spans decades. Also, some fun new awards will be presented backstage this year, like the, erm, dubious honour of Most Attention-seeking New Gen Host.
articles.content: Similarly chuffed to be nominated was Cynthia Koh, who jokingly referenced how shed made headlines in the past year for wearing a daring dress. I know everyone saw that blue dress I wore, and it must… [+618 chars]

articles.author: Marina Fang
articles.title: ‘Turning Red’ Director Domee Shi Made An ‘Asian Tween Fever Dream’ About Puberty - HuffPost
articles.description: The movie is Shi's feature directorial debut following her Oscar-winning Pixar short, “Bao," and delightfully captures the messiness of being 13.
articles.content:
Meilin Lee (voiced by Rosalie Chiang) in "Turning Red," directed by Domee Shi.
Being a 13-year-old girl entering puberty can be a nightmare: What is going on with my body? Why do I feel like Im goin… [+6502 chars]

articles.author: Eryk Bagshaw
articles.title: South Korea has its first populist President, a swashbuckler ready to take on Beijing - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: The ingredients that helped make Donald Trump president of the United States just made Yoon Suk-yeol the next leader of the Asian powerhouse economy.
articles.content:
Yoon wants to take his mandate and South Korean diplomacy deeper into the USs sphere of influence.
There is a well of gratitude here for the US Armys role in the Korean War. American flags still fly… [+3634 chars]

articles.title: Barbie Hsu's mother's reaction to the actress marrying former boyfriend: 'I was kept in the dark' - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: When asked if she would meet Hsu's new husband, Huang Chunmei replied, “It all depends if I’m feeling up to it at the time. Whether I want to see him, wait until the time comes, then we’ll talk.”
